resources.name: Change User
resources.description:
#### Request
```JSON
{
	"sessionid": "",
	"userid": "",
	"key": "",
	"value": ""
}
```

`sessionid` --> Session-ID of the user trying to edit the user (>=1 voor leerling, 2 voor leerkracht)

`userid` --> User-ID of the user being edited

`key`, `value` --> The key-value pair to change in the database

resources.name: Change Password (Privilege = 2)
resources.description:
### Request
```JSON
{
	"sessionId":"",
	"userId": "",
	"newSha256": "",
	"newMd5": ""
}
```

`sessionId` --> Session ID of the admin (privilege = 2) trying to change a password
`userId` --> User ID of the user to change password of
hashes --> New password hashes

resources.name: Change password (Privilege < 2)
resources.description:
### Request
```JSON
{
	"sessionId": "",
	"sha256": "",
	"md5": "",
	"newSha256": "",
	"newMd5": ""
}
```

`sessionId` --> sessionID of the user changing their password
hashes --> Old and new password hashes

resources.name: Remove User
resources.description:
### Request
```JSON
{
	"sessionId": "sessionID",
	"userId": "userID"
}
```
`sessionId` --> Session ID of the admin user (privilege = 2) trying to remove the user

`userId` --> User ID of the user to be removed

resources.name: Remove Material
resources.description:
### Request
```JSON
{
	"sessionId": "sessionID",
	"materialId": "materialID"
}
```
`sessionId` --> Session ID of the admin user (privilege = 2) trying to remove the material

`materialId` --> User ID of the materiam to be removed

resources.name: Logout
resources.description:
### Request
```JSON
{
	"sessionId": "sessionid"
}
```

`sessionId`--> Session-ID of user logging out

resources.name: Lend Material
resources.description:
### Request
```JSON
{
	"userid": "userid",
	"materialid": "materialid"
}
```
`userid` --> User-ID of the user trying to lend the material

`materialid` --> Material-ID of the material being lend out

### Response
ISO-Timecode to return material
```
2024-02-08T00:00:00.000Z
```

resources.name: Create Material
resources.description:
### Request
```JSON
{
	"sessionid": "sessionid",
	"title": "A Fairy Tale",
	"place": "AVI-XX",
	"description": {
		"author": "John Doe",
		"pages": 420,
		"readinglevel": "AVI-XX"
	},
	"available": true
}
```

`sessionid` --> Session-ID of the user creating the material (privilege 2)

`title` --> Title of the material

`place` --> Location of the material in the library

`description` --> Information about the material

`available` --> Whether the material is currently available

resources.name: Get material
resources.description:
### Request
```JSON
{
	"sessionid": "sessionid",
	"materialid": "materialid"
}
```
`sessionid` --> Session-id of user requesting the material

`materialid` --> Material-id of the material being requested

### Response
#### Privilege 0
```JSON
{
	"materialid": "materialid",
	"title": "A Fairy Tale",
	"place": "AVI-XX",
	"descr": {
		"author": "Dr. John Doe",
		"cover": "http://host.com/cover.png",
		"pages": xxx,
		"readinglevel": "AVI-XX"
	},
	"available": "X",
	"lendoutto": null,
	"startdate": null,
	"returndate": null,
	"lendcount": null,
	"avgscore": 0
}
```
#### Privilege >=1
```JSON
[
	{
		"materialid": "materialid",
		"title": "A Fairy Tale",
		"place": "AVI-XX",
		"descr": {
			"author": "Dr. John Doe",
			"cover": "http://host.com/cover.png",
			"pages": xxx,
			"readinglevel": "AVI-XX"
		},
		"available": "1",
		"lendoutto": "userid",
		"startdate": "timestring",
		"returndate": "timestring",
		"lendcount": 0,
		"avgscore": 0
	}
]
```

resources.name: Create User
resources.description:
### Request
```JSON
{
	"sessionid": "sessionid",
	"name":"John",
	"surname":"Doe",
	"privilege":0,
	"sha256": "sha256",
	"md5":"md5",
	
	// Only when creating pupils
	"classNum":"00",
	"cls":"XX",
	"history":[
  	{
   		"enddate": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
    	"fullyread": true,
    	"material": "materialid",
    	"ontime": true,
    	"score": x,
    	"startdate": "2024-01-01"
  	}
	]
	"readinglevel":"AVI-XX"
}
```
`sessionid` --> Session-id of the admin-user trying to create the account (Must have privilege 2)

further --> Details about user

resources.name: Get user
resources.description:
### Request
```
{
	"sessionid": "sessionid"
	"userid": "userid"
}
```
`sessionid` --> Session-id of user making the request.

`user` --> User-id of user to be requested.

### Response
#### Privilege 0
```
{
	"userid": "userid",
	"firstname": "John",
	"lastname": "Doe",
	"class": "XX",
	"classnum": 00,
	"readinglevel": "AVI-XX",
	"privilege": null,
	"sha256": null,
	"md5": null,
	"materials": [],
	"history": null,
	"howmuchlate": 0,
	"sessionid": null,
	"sessionidexpire": null
}
```
#### Privilege >=1
```
{
	"userid": "b10b148c-101c-4733-a79b-74d3c4302fcd",
	"firstname": "John",
	"lastname": "Doe",
	"class": "XX",
	"classnum": 00,
	"readinglevel": "AVI-XX",
	"privilege": 0,
	"sha256": null,
	"md5": null,
	"materials": [],
	"history": [],
	"howmuchlate": 0,
	"sessionid": null,
	"sessionidexpire": null
}
```

resources.name: Login pupil
resources.description:
### Request

```
{
	"clss": "5WEWI1A",
	"number": "2",
	"sha256": "sha256",
	"md5": "md5"
}
```
`clss` --> Class of pupil trying to log in

`number` --> Classnumber of pupil trying to log in

`sha256`, `md5` --> Hashes of teacher trying to log in
### Response
```
{
	"sessionid": "sessionid",
	"userid": "userid",
	"privilege": 0
}
```
`sessionid` --> The session-id of the logged in user

`userid` --> The user-id of the logged in user

`privilege` --> The privilege level of the logged in user

resources.name: Login teacher
resources.description:
### Request
```JSON
{
	"name": "John",
	"surname": "Doe",
	"sha256": "sha256",
	"md5": "md5"
}
```
`name`, `surname` --> Name of teacher trying to log in.

`sha256`, `md5` --> Hashes of teacher trying to log in.
### Response
```
{
	"sessionid": "sessionid",
	"userid": "userid",
	"privilege": 1
}
```
`sessionid` --> The session-id of the logged in user

`userid` --> The user-id of the logged in user

`privilege` --> The privilege level of the logged in user
